title: How do I find good, safe housing for 55+ seniors in Wilmington, NC?
text:
There are so many factors to consider when looking for safe housing
that it comes down to personal preferences, needs and resources.



You might want to contact the New Hanover County Senior Resource
Center at http://www.nhcgov.com/SRC/Pages/default.aspx



The Wilmington Housing Authority also might have some advice:
http://www.wha.net/
